radiographic_examinations.findings: Enlarged, multinodular thyroid gland with a total volume of 31 ml.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: When last seen at age 14, ultrasound showed a multinodular and multicystic goiter with a total volume of 33 ml.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Asymmetrically enlarged thyroid gland (thyroid volume 3.88 ml).
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Total thyroid volume 23 ml; progressive in size with a homogeneous structure containing a single small cyst.
